
```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(knitr)
library(dplyr)

# Example dataset
data <- mtcars |>
  select(mpg, cyl, hp, gear) |>
  head(10) # Using only first 10 rows for a short table

data
```

```{r}
# Basic table with knitr::kable()
kable(data, caption = "Table 1: Basic mtcars Summary")

```

```{r}

# Add formatting with round and column names
data_formatted <- data |>
  mutate(
    mpg = round(mpg, 1),
    hp = round(hp, 0)
  )

data_formatted
```

```{r}

kable(data_formatted,
  col.names = c("Miles/Gal", "Cylinders", "Horsepower", "Gears"),
  caption = "Table 2: Formatted mtcars Summary"
)

```

```{r}

# Summary statistics table
summary_table <- mtcars |>
  summarise(
    Mean_MPG = mean(mpg),
    SD_MPG = sd(mpg),
    Mean_HP = mean(hp),
    SD_HP = sd(hp)
  )

summary_table
```

```{r}
kable(summary_table, digits = 2, caption = "Table 3: Summary Statistics for mpg and hp")
```
